content.question: The work, which was created in medieval Islamic Spain, demonstrates the influence of

choices.label: aniconic representational styles that originated in Arabia
intricate animal styles found in early medieval metalwork
ivory carving traditions that existed throughout the Mediterranean
Asian lacquerware techniques that were brought along the Silk Road

content.answer: ivory carving traditions that existed throughout the Mediterranean

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
